name: 500 Slide - Free Image Puzzle
description:
A image slider puzzle using gorgeous images from 500px.com. Finally, an image slider using images you actually want to look at.

Four difficulty levels (three on iPhone) for different length puzzles.

Free version shows images from 500px Editors choice. One In-App purchase to allow more feeds, categories, searching, and user photos. Any photos marked as Not Suitable For Work are filtered out.

Works in both portrait and landscape.

Requires internet connection to download images.
